description:
With enough room for you + 3, the Kohana 4 Tent is your ticket to getting everyone outside. Mesh panels on the doors, walls and roof keep the bugs out, but help even the lightest sleepers stay cool on hot summer nights. The perfectly uncomplicated structure is everything you need for long weekend getaways and is tall enough to kneel upright and move around comfortably.

  • Floor and fly are made of durable polyester with a waterproof polyurethane coating
  • Bathtub floor wraps up the sides of the tent to protect against splashes and puddles
  • No-see-um mesh panels in the doors, side walls and roof keep bugs out and let the breeze in
  • Hooded vestibule vent adds ventilation to minimize condensation buildup
  • 2 doors and 2 vestibules give everyone exit options and provide exterior storage space for shoes and other gear
  • Colour-coded webbing on tent and fly makes setup a cinch
  • Crossed-pole dome architecture gives you plenty of room inside
  • 2 interior pockets plus a gear loft let you stash headlamps, spare socks and other easy-to-misplace items
name: Eureka! Kohana 4-Person Tent
